full_text: @piterkeo Eu consigo atendimento aqui, mas não com reumato. A cidade (com 80 mil habitantes) oferece 4 cotas por mês dessa especialidade. Eu tive que cancelar meu atendimento no sul pq me obrigaram a tranferir o cartão do SUS pra me vacinar contra covid, o que no fim nem precisava

user.name: Elisa von Groll
user.description:
Entomologist (#Scaphidiinae & #Chrysomelidae) and macro photographer

texto_en: @piterkeo I can get care here, but not with rheumatism. the city (with a constant_numeric thousand inhabitants) offers constant_numeric quotas per month for this specialty. I had to cancel my service in the south because they forced me to transfer the sus card to vaccinate myself against covid, which in the end I didn't even need
